meaningMnemonic: Inside this <radical>moon</radical> is a <radical>black hole</radical>... haha just kidding, it's your <kanji>belly</kanji>! It's beautiful and round like the moon and it eats up everything you give it like a black hole. What a good <kanji>stomach</kanji> you have!
readingMnemonic: If you don't treat your <kanji>belly</kanji> with respect, when you look down at it, it'll yell, "<reading>F**k</reading> (ふく) you!" Be nice to your stomach!
